thread.title: Obama Is Furious Following This Pro-Gun Speech By Sheriff David Clarke | Obama
thread.title_full: Obama Is Furious Following This Pro-Gun Speech By Sheriff David Clarke | Obama

author: beforeitsnews.com
title: Obama Is Furious Following This Pro-Gun Speech By Sheriff David Clarke | Obama
text:
(Before It's News)
Many people would like to argue that it’s the government who has the power to prevent the slew of recent shootings. With persistent pressure from President Obama, the NRA is pushing back hard– as was epitomized in this controversial speech delivered by Sheriff David A. Clarke Jr during the NRA-ILA Forum. At one point he even states; “We should take those arrows out of the eagle’s claws and replace them with a semi-automatic rifle.” I’m sure the Forefathers would approve to the upgrade!
Milwaukee County Sheriff David Clarke addresses the crowd at the NRA-ILA Leadership Forum, an event of the 2015 NRA Annual Meetings in Nashville, Tennessee. Originally aired 4/10/15.
